pasugiya samaye pawathi yudamaya wathawaranaya hethuwen swakiya niwasa athahara giya pudgalayinge nam chanda himi namalekhanayata athulath kirima sandaha wishesha wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka bawa mathiwarana mahalekam karyalaya pawasayi. 2011 wasare chanda himi namalekhana prathishodhanaya ikuth juni masa palamuwanida aarambha kala bawa mathiwarana komasaris mahinda deshapriya mahatha sandahan karayi.

asathya chodana matha shri lanka kridaka kusal pererata tharanga thahanamak panawima wenuwen wandiyak labadimata ekagathawa palawi athayi wides puwath sewa pawasanawa.palamu warata skotlanthayedi pawathi jathyanthara krikat kawunsila warshika sasiwarayedi mema thiranayata elambaa athi bawayi wartha wanne.kusal pererata wandi pirinamime thiranaya jathyanthara krikat kawunsila samajikayan eekachchandayen anumatha kara athayi sandahan.thahanam uththejaka bhawitha kirime chodana matha kusal janith pererata panawa thibu tharaga thahanama jathyanthara krikat kawunsilaya wisin pasugiya mayi masaye iwathkara ganu labuwa.
